title: Windows 10 Home/Pro Insider Preview Build 10147 en-US x64 [A.K.]
description:
[img]https://www.thurrott.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/06/10147-hero.jpg[/img]

HereÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s what IÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ve seen so far.

[b]Windows 10 Home.[/b] You can choose between Windows 10 ProÃ¢â‚¬â€which has been the only choice for InsidersÃ¢â‚¬â€and Windows 10 Home during Setup. So what the heck, I went with Home on the first install.

[img]https://www.thurrott.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/06/choice.jpg[/img]

[b]Product key.[/b] In the surest sign yet that this thing is wrapping up soon, this build asks for a product key Ã¢â‚¬Â¦ twice. And if you donÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t provide one, you canÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t edit certain personalization settings, as with Windows 8.1.

[img]https://www.thurrott.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/06/color.jpg[/img]

[b]Default wallpaper.[/b] The new default wallpaper matches the one we see in Windows 10 Mobile for Phones build 10146, which I think is a nice bit of synchronicity.

[img]https://www.thurrott.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/06/default-wp.jpg[/img]

[b]A bit of contrast.[/b] IÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ve been complaining about the all-white-nothing-but-white Windows 10 UI for a while now, but it looks like weÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re finally starting to see a hint of contrast, especially in universal app windows. ItÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s not as much as IÃ¢â‚¬â„¢d like, but better than before.

[img]https://www.thurrott.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/06/nice.jpg[/img]

[b]New icons.[/b] The icons on the Mail, Calendar, People and Maps tiles have been updated with new designs, similar to what we saw with Music and Movies & TV (previously Videos) in earlier builds.

[img]https://www.thurrott.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/06/new-icons.jpg[/img]

[b]Get Office and Get Skype[/b] icons are in the All Apps list.

[b]Edge[/b] gets a dark theme option.

[img]https://www.thurrott.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/06/dark-theme.jpg[/img]

[b]Fit and finish.[/b] As promised, there are tons of little fin and finish changes in this build, especially to icons, and to some of the apps.

[img]https://www.thurrott.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/06/fit-and-fin.jpg[/img]

[img]https://www.thurrott.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/06/cal-start.jpg[/img]


Enjoy,
